problem_info.title: 3397. Maximum Number of Distinct Elements After Operations
test_examples: Example 1: Input: nums = [1,2,2,3,3,4], k = 2 Output: 6 Explanation: nums changes to [-1, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4] after performing operations on the first four elements.
Example 2: Input: nums = [4,4,4,4], k = 1 Output: 3 Explanation: By adding -1 to nums[0] and 1 to nums[1], nums changes to [3, 5, 4, 4].
